kado is the world's largest online only

house I think it's really difficult to

about digital transformation rather than

suggestion would be you need to find a
clear cloud first strategy that works
for you because clearly it's not a one

reasons why we surpris lose the cloud
the first one that we wanted greater

middleware and services that tons which

but then another need came up which is
we when we embarked on building the
Accardo smart platform which is making

and mortar retailers around the world we

centers around the world we wanted to

our decisions lose the cloud we chose
AWS and the cloud provider not only
